topics.title: Side Navigation
topics.content: The SideNavigation control is a container, which consists of flexible and fixed parts on top of each other. The flexible part adapts its size to the fixed one. The flexible part has a scrollbar when the content is larger than the available space. Whenever the height of the whole control is less than 256 pixels, the scrollbar becomes joint for the two parts.

topics.title: Visualization
topics.content: This component is a visualization component. It requires specific space in the application canvas.
